trans-unit.source: Represents a rule that checks for exceptions that are thrown during the update of the binding source property.
trans-unit.target: 表示規則，這個規則會檢查繫結來源屬性更新期間所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding model enables you to associate <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A> with a <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> object.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]資料繫結模型可讓您將<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A>與<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule> class is a built-in rule that checks for exceptions that are thrown during the updates of the binding source property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule>類別是內建規則會檢查繫結來源屬性更新期間所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: You can provide custom logic to specify how the binding engine handles these exceptions by using a <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceExceptionFilterCallback>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以提供自訂邏輯以指定繫結引擎如何處理這些例外狀況使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceExceptionFilterCallback>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceExceptionFilter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceExceptionFilter%2A>。

trans-unit.source: An alternative syntax to setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule> explicitly is to set the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnExceptions%2A> property to `true` on your <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> or <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定替代語法<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule>明確設定為<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnExceptions%2A>屬性`true`上您<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>或<xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>物件。

trans-unit.source: You can create a custom rule by creating a class that derives from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立自訂規則建立的類別，衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>。

trans-unit.source: For more information and a detailed discussion of data validation, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊和資料驗證的詳細的討論，請參閱[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A> property takes a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A>屬性採用一個集合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> as the binding target property and `StartPrice` (an integer) as the binding source property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox.Text%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>為繫結目標屬性和`StartPrice`（整數） 為繫結來源屬性。

trans-unit.source: When the user enters a value that cannot be converted to an integer, an exception is thrown, which causes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule> to invalidate the target value.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者輸入的值無法轉換成整數時，會擲回例外狀況，這會導致<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule>要使其失效的目標值。

trans-unit.source: By default, when there is a validation error, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> appears with a red border.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，當沒有驗證錯誤時，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>出現紅色框線。

trans-unit.source: Optionally, you can write a custom <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ErrorTemplate%2A> to specify how you want to notify the user when there is a validation error.
trans-unit.target: （選擇性） 您可以撰寫自訂<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ErrorTemplate%2A>，指定您要如何驗證錯誤時通知使用者。

trans-unit.source: For more information about data validation, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資料驗證的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: For the complete sample, see [Data Binding Demo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703).
trans-unit.target: 如需完整範例，請參閱[資料繫結示範](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ExceptionValidationRule" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The value (from the binding target) to check.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的值 (來自繫結目標)。

trans-unit.source: The culture to use in this rule.
trans-unit.target: 要在這個規則中使用的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: Performs validation checks on a value.
trans-unit.target: 在值上執行驗證檢查。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationResult" /> 物件。
